carta.title: Title
carta.deleteConfirm: This action deletes all your posts and content from Carta. Are you sure you want to continue?
carta.requireContent: Please add text or an image
carta.limitExceeded: Please post a text with less than 1000 characters
carta.verificationEmail: Hey {name}, you've received an email from us. Please open it and click on the link to verify your account
carta.verificationSuccess: Verification success! You will be redirected in {timer} seconds
carta.verificationFail: Verification failed. Your verification code is not correct.
carta.requireEmail: Please fill in your email address
carta.validEmail: Please enter a valid email address
carta.passwordLength: Your password must be 6 characters or longer
carta.incorrectEmail: We don't know this email. Register if you like!
carta.alreadyRegistered: You are already registered. Please sign in
